title: A transnational cosmopolitan: an interview with Ulf Hannerz
abstract: An interview with Ulf Hannerz,Professor of Social Anthropology at Stockholm University. He is Sweden’s most famous anthropologist and well known internationally for his contribution to the anthropological study of globalization
